pkgmetadata.longdescription: Pedigree Models // Provides functions to estimate mixed probit models using, for instance, pedigree data like in doi:10.1002/sim.1603. The models are also commonly called liability threshold models. The approximation is based on direct log marginal likelihood approximations like the randomized Quasi-Monte Carlo suggested by doi:10.1198/106186002394 with a similar procedure to approximate the derivatives. Graph-based methods are also provided that can be used to simplify pedigrees.
